availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

creation.placeName: New York, New York County, New York

body.p:
Eighth District Court,
SOUTH WEST CORNER OF 22d. ST. & 7th. AVE.
New York, March 27 1862
His Excellency Beriah Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky.

I enclose herewith my application for an appointment as Commissioner of Deeds for your State resident in New York City. There are no Commissioners for your State within quite a distance of my office -- I am Commissioner for Maryland & a few other states and should like very much to be Commissioner for yours.. Hoping a favorable answer I remain

Very Respectfully
David Mc Adam
Counsellor at Law
